queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles with wildcard RBAC permissions provide excessive rights to the Kubernetes API and should be avoided. The principle of least privilege recommends to specify only the set of needed objects and actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ibm-kerify-role}}.rules[0].apiGroups should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ibm-kerify-role}}.rules[0].apiGroups uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ibm-kerify-role}}.rules[1].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ibm-kerify-role}}.rules[1].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ibm-kerify-role}}.rules[0].resources should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ibm-kerify-role}}.rules[0].resources uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ibm-kerify-role}}.rules[0].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ibm-kerify-role}}.rules[0].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

queries.query_name: Volume Mount With OS Directory Write Permissions
queries.description: Containers can mount sensitive folders from the hosts, giving them potentially dangerous access to critical host configurations and binaries.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ibm-kerify}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{ibm-kerify}}.volumeMounts.name={{docker-sock}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ibm-kerify}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{ibm-kerify}}.volumeMounts.name={{docker-sock}}.readOnly is undefined

queries.description: Containers should only run as non-root user. This limits the exploitability of security misconfigurations and restricts an attacker's possibilities in case of compromise

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{ibm-kerify-dev-release-name-test}}.spec.containers.name={{ibm-kerify-dev-container}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{ibm-kerify-dev-release-name-test}}.spec.containers.name={{ibm-kerify-dev-container}}.securityContext.runAsUser is 0 and 'runAsNonRoot' is false

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ibm-kerify}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{ibm-kerify}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ibm-kerify}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{ibm-kerify}}.securityContext.runAsUser is 0 and 'runAsNonRoot' is false

queries.description: Check if containers are running with low UID, which might cause conflicts with the host's user table.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ibm-kerify}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{ibm-kerify}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be set to a UID >= 10000
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ibm-kerify}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{ibm-kerify}}.securityContext.runAsUser is set to a low UID

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{ibm-kerify-dev-release-name-test}}.spec.containers.name={{ibm-kerify-dev-container}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be set to a UID >= 10000
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{ibm-kerify-dev-release-name-test}}.spec.containers.name={{ibm-kerify-dev-container}}.securityContext.runAsUser is set to a low UID

queries.description: Containers should not have extra capabilities allowed

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ibm-kerify}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{ibm-kerify}} has no capability added other than NET_BIND_SERVICE
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ibm-kerify}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{ibm-kerify}} has a capability added other than NET_BIND_SERVICE

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{ibm-kerify-dev-release-name-test}}.spec.containers.name={{ibm-kerify-dev-container}} has no capability added other than NET_BIND_SERVICE
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{ibm-kerify-dev-release-name-test}}.spec.containers.name={{ibm-kerify-dev-container}} has a capability added other than NET_BIND_SERVICE

queries.description: The permission to create pods in a cluster should be restricted because it allows privilege escalation.

files.expected_value: metadata.name=release-name-ibm-kerify-role.rules.verbs should not contain a wildcard value when metadata.name=release-name-ibm-kerify-role.rules.resources contains a wildcard value
files.actual_value: metadata.name=release-name-ibm-kerify-role.rules.verbs contains a wildcard value and metadata.name=release-name-ibm-kerify-role.rules.resources contains a wildcard value

queries.description: Check if Readiness Probe is not configured.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{ibm-kerify-dev-release-name-test}}.spec.containers.name={{ibm-kerify-dev-container}}.readinessProbe should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{ibm-kerify-dev-release-name-test}}.spec.containers.name={{ibm-kerify-dev-container}}.readinessProbe is undefined

queries.description: Containers should be configured with a secure Seccomp profile to restrict potentially dangerous syscalls

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ibm-kerify}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{ibm-kerify}}.securityContext.seccompProfile.type should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ibm-kerify}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{ibm-kerify}}.securityContext.seccompProfile.type is undefined

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{ibm-kerify-dev-release-name-test}}.spec.containers.name={{ibm-kerify-dev-container}}.securityContext.seccompProfile.type should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{ibm-kerify-dev-release-name-test}}.spec.containers.name={{ibm-kerify-dev-container}}.securityContext.seccompProfile.type is undefined

queries.query_name: Service Account Token Automount Not Disabled
queries.description: Service Account Tokens are automatically mounted even if not necessary

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ibm-kerify}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ibm-kerify}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken is undefined

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{ibm-kerify-dev-release-name-test}}.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{ibm-kerify-dev-release-name-test}}.spec.automountServiceAccountToken is undefined

queries.description: A Service Account token is shared between workloads

files.expected_value: 'spec.template.spec.serviceAccountName' should not be shared with other workloads
files.actual_value: 'spec.template.spec.serviceAccountName' is shared with other workloads

files.expected_value: 'spec.serviceAccountName' should not be shared with other workloads
files.actual_value: 'spec.serviceAccountName' is shared with other workloads

queries.description: Namespaces like 'default', 'kube-system' or 'kube-public' should not be used

files.expected_value: metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
files.actual_value: metadata.namespace is undefined or null

files.expected_value: metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
files.actual_value: metadata.namespace is undefined or null

files.expected_value: metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
files.actual_value: metadata.namespace is undefined or null

files.expected_value: metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
files.actual_value: metadata.namespace is undefined or null

files.expected_value: 'metadata.namespace' should not be set to default, kube-system or kube-public
files.actual_value: 'metadata.namespace' is set to default

queries.query_name: Image Pull Policy Of The Container Is Not Set To Always
queries.description: Image Pull Policy of the container must be defined and set to Always

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{ibm-kerify-dev-release-name-test}}.spec.containers.name={{ibm-kerify-dev-container}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{ibm-kerify-dev-release-name-test}}.spec.containers.name={{ibm-kerify-dev-container}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ibm-kerify}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{ibm-kerify}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ibm-kerify}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{ibm-kerify}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

queries.description: Containers should be configured with an AppArmor profile to enforce fine-grained access control over low-level system resources

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{ibm-kerify-dev-release-name-test}}.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{ibm-kerify-dev-container}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{ibm-kerify-dev-release-name-test}}.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{ibm-kerify-dev-container}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ibm-kerify}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{ibm-kerify}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ibm-kerify}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{ibm-kerify}}

queries.query_name: Object Is Using A Deprecated API Version
queries.description: Kubernetes APIs evolve over time and are sometimes removed with newer releases. To prevent incompatibilities when upgrading Kubernetes, deprecated APIs should be replaced with newer and more stable API versions.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ibm-kerify-ingress}}.apiVersion of Ingress should be {{networking.k8s.io/v1}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ibm-kerify-ingress}}.apiVersion of Ingress  is deprecated and is {{extensions/v1beta1}}

queries.description: Each namespace should have a LimitRange policy associated to ensure that resource allocations of Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims do not exceed the defined boundaries

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ibm-kerify}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ibm-kerify}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{ibm-kerify-dev-release-name-test}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{ibm-kerify-dev-release-name-test}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

queries.description: Each namespace should have a ResourceQuota policy associated to limit the total amount of resources Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims can consume

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ibm-kerify}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ibm-kerify}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{ibm-kerify-dev-release-name-test}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{ibm-kerify-dev-release-name-test}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

queries.description: Check if the root container filesystem is not being mounted read-only.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{ibm-kerify-dev-release-name-test}}.spec.containers.name={{ibm-kerify-dev-container}}.securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem is true
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{ibm-kerify-dev-release-name-test}}.spec.containers.name={{ibm-kerify-dev-container}}.securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem is false

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ibm-kerify}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{ibm-kerify}}.securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem is true
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ibm-kerify}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{ibm-kerify}}.securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem is false

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ibm-kerify-svc}}.spec.ports.port={{80}} has a Pod port
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ibm-kerify-svc}}.spec.ports.port={{80}} does not have a Pod port

queries.description: Service type should not be NodePort

files.expected_value: spec.type should not be 'NodePort'
files.actual_value: spec.type is 'NodePort'
